fuzzing_params.Constraints: 1 <= s.length <= 3000, 1 <= k <= s.length, s consists only of lowercase English letters.

problem_info.title: 3325. Count Substrings With K-Frequency Characters I
test_examples: Example 1: Input: s = "abacb", k = 2 Output: 4 Explanation: The valid substrings are: "aba" (character 'a' appears 2 times). "abac" (character 'a' appears 2 times). "abacb" (character 'a' appears 2 times). "bacb" (character 'b' appears 2 times).
Example 2: Input: s = "abcde", k = 1 Output: 15 Explanation: All substrings are valid because every character appears at least once.
